The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 November is 1,015,672 (1,804.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 November, there were 136,868 new confirmed cases (243.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 October, there were 129,065 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% ( 7,803 extra cases).
